title: We are Giving Away $100,000,000 to All Users!
content: ComingChat along with its ecosystem partners has a series of events lined up from January — February 2022.\nWe would release 80% of rewards(~$80,000,000) to our ecosystem community members and 20%(~$20,000,000) to those who collect 5 Tiger NFTs. \nThere will be 11 opportunities to collect those 5 Tiger NFTs  throughout the ChainX community, the Comfuture platform, the SherpaX community, ComingChat App and the ComingChat community.

title: Invitation Referal Program
content:
Invite Friends to Download & Register on ComingChat App to get Tiger CID NFT

Prize:
One NFT for new group member and group owner
*At the same time, every time you invite a user, you can get One NFT

Task:
Create a new public group on ComingChat
Invite new users to join your group

Rewards will be airdropped to both you and the new user's CID addresses within 3 hrs.

Duration:
Jan.21st @00:00 am UTC- Feb.15th @11:59 pm UTC

Please Note:
Group needs to be created after Jan.21 @00:00 am UTC
New user needs to register after Jan.21 @00:00 am UTC

title: AMA Covering Tiger NFT Giveaways
content:
Tune in for our Live AMA Session covering Tiger NFT questions, on Telegram Group! 

Prize Pool:
100 "Tiger ComingChat" NFTs for 100 re-tweeters
100 $KSX for 5 most valuable questions
100 Mini Points for 1 lucky user

Time:
Thursday Jan 27th @ 8:00 AM UTC

title: sBTC Cross-chain Tutorial
content: Refer to this article to learn the cross-chain operation of sBTC.

title: New Registration Bounty
content:
Say hi to all our new friends

Prize:
One Tiger CID NFT for every new user

Task:
Register an account on ComingChat

Duration:
Jan.30th @00:00 am UTC- Feb.7th @11:59 pm UTC

title: Limited Offer for Mini Point-PCX swap!
content:
We are introducing a Limited time offer for Mini-PCX swap. We would be accepting trades for the swap Every Friday starting at 8 am UTC. 
Please note:
1) Only first 10 buyers and 10 sellers who contact CID 7 would be accepted for the trade.
2) DO NOT transfer your funds to CID 7 before receiving a confirmation from CID 7.
3) Any funds transferred to CID 7 without confirmation WILL NOT be refunded under any circumstances.
